4
24=x+6*4+312/13-8*3
(3-99)/(94-98)+(5*2-2)*3+13824/(48-4*3*2)/(100/(90-88)-26)+x+12/(1+2)*6=24-1*(12+2*6)*24/(48/4+10+2)-((12+3)*2-6)*600/30/20
24=x+(88/4+11*2+3*12/(6*3)*(7+4)+2200/(5*2)/(8*4/2-6))/11*3+6*4+312/13+8*3+(38-5-21)*2
((30/2+50*3/10+20/4*3-39+3+5*3)/(14/7-8+30))/(((10+8*2+27/3*2-8)/(36/6)+18)/(26+46/(20-43)))=24+x
